item.title: My First Post
item.description: Project: This is my first electron App, maybe a little too late regarding on what is the future for electron but I needed a very minimal vertical stocks ticker app. Important note, the app comes AS-IS , also this was a weekend hack so expect some not tested edge cases. Modes If the martket is open it will display a small sun and if closed a small moon. This is not just a visual aid, but at day it will create a direct websocket connection to update data and at night it will pull data manually every 30min.
item.content:
Project:

This is my first electron App, maybe a little too late regarding on what is the future for electron but I needed a very minimal vertical stocks ticker app.

Important note, the app comes AS-IS , also this was a weekend hack so expect some not tested edge cases.

Modes

If the martket is open it will display a small sun and if closed a small moon. This is not just a visual aid, but at day it will create a direct websocket connection to update data and at night it will pull data manually every 30min.
